Heading: PopCorn Tub Making Machine
Description: This machine is manufactured using latest technology and high tech equipments which are reliable as well as durable. This machine can produce finely sealed paper bucket/tubs with a production speed of upto 35 bowls per minute. With great quality mechanical parts, inspite of being high speed production, power consumption is still low. It is designed using Single Turn Plate Technology and Direct Bottom Technology.
Imgdesc: This machine is used for making large containers like Popcorn Tubs, Chicken Buckets, and many more. Moreover, this machine has certain additional features like photoelectric sensors for paper feeding and bowl counting.
PointsHeadingDesc: This heavy and compact machine structure is equipped with a modern single-turn plate and open cam technology. These technologies generate more significant output while maintaining a stable production process. This machine is used for making large containers like Popcorn Tubs, Chicken Buckets, and many more.
ImageDescription: This High-speed Paper Tub Making Machine has been embedded with patented open cam technology and produces up to 35 pcs per minute. The average size of the paper tubs ranges from 28 to 190 Oz. The diameter can be controlled to be between 120 to 220 mm, whereas each tubâ€™s height can be around 100 to 200mm. This self-sufficient machine can complete the entire procedure of manufacturing paper tubs itself, including curling and sealing. These containers are finely sealed as this machine has ultrasonic heaters for bowl sealing.

MachineSpecs.specs: Serving Popcorn, Chicken, Salad, Noodles, etc
